name: Gold Dash
description:
Grab the coins and get out before time runs out.

Gold Dash is a condensed metroidvania with no combat and a tight time limit. You can find an ability that will allow you to navigate the entire map but should you go for it or focus on grabbing the coins you can and getting out before the timer reaches 0?

Controls:

W/A or Left/Right Arrows - move

Space - jump

Credits:

Coding by yours truly

Art by Buch

Music by DeltaBreaker

Sounds from 8-bit Platformer SFX commissioned by Mark McCorkle for OpenGameArt.org ( http://opengameart.org )

Font by Daniel Linssen

Touch controls by Kenney

Made with Godot engine
